structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Limit on expense to be incurred.
law.text: Except with the approval of the city legislative body, the commission shall not incur for maintenance purposes of the memorial, or permit the incurrence of, any liability or expense exceeding the total funds derived or to be derived for any fiscal year by appropriation from the city for such year, or the levying and collection of taxes for such purpose in the fiscal year, supplemented by income from the memorial and by donations in money or property reduced to money made to the commission for maintenance purposes.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 363, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 5, effective June 17, 1954. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3037i-12.
